name: BoomBots
description: BoomBots is a fighting video game released in 1999 for PlayStation. It was created by Doug TenNapel, best known as the creator of Earthworm Jim, and it was developed by The Neverhood, Inc. Moreover, it was published by SouthPeak Interactive. Like other games developed by The Neverhood, Inc. (The Neverhood and Skullmonkeys), BoomBots features distinctive claymation visuals and various amounts of toilet humor. This game was both a critical and commercial failure.
